attributes.name: Auto focusing modes
attributes.description: Identifies the type of autofocus in cameras, such as spot or tracking

attributes.name: Background design
attributes.description: Describes the visual design or pattern on a studio background, such as printed or chroma key

attributes.name: Binocular/Monocular design
attributes.description: Describes the specific use for binoculars or monoculars, such as astronomy or hunting

attributes.name: Borescope design
attributes.description: Describes the type of borescope, such as flexible, rigid, or fiberscope

attributes.name: Camera HD type
attributes.description: Specifies the camera's video quality, such as Quad HD or 8K ultra HD

attributes.name: Camera attachment
attributes.description: Specifies the camera part or accessory, such as an angle viewfinder or eyepiece adapter

attributes.name: Camera button/knob type
attributes.description: Identifies the button or knob on a camera, e.g. shutter release button, mode dial knob

attributes.name: Camera control type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of camera remote control, e.g. remote switch, shutter release

attributes.name: Camera display technology
attributes.description: Specifies the screen technology of a camera, e.g. OLED, Super AMOLED

attributes.name: Camera features
attributes.description: Identifies special capabilities of a camera, like image stabilization or face detection

attributes.name: Camera gear type
attributes.description: Identifies the specific type of camera gear, such as camera drive or follow focus

attributes.name: Collar/Mount compatible device
attributes.description: Specifies the compatible device for tripod collars or mounts, e.g. lens, camera

attributes.name: Collar/Mount design
attributes.description: Describes the design of tripod collars or mounts, such as quick release or ring

attributes.name: Color saturation
attributes.description: Indicates the intensity of color in camera film, e.g. high, low

attributes.name: Compatible film type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of film a camera can use, like negative film or color film

attributes.name: Contrast
attributes.description: Used to specify the level of contrast in camera film, e.g. normal or high

attributes.name: Converter functionality
attributes.description: Identifies the specific function of lens converters, such as speed booster or wide angle

attributes.name: Diffuser design
attributes.description: Describes the structure of a flash diffuser, such as ring or dome

attributes.name: Exposure control
attributes.description: Defines the method of adjusting the amount of light in a photo, e.g. shutter priority, aperture priority

attributes.name: Film type
attributes.description: Identifies the size and format of film used in cameras, such as 35 mm or 120 mm

attributes.name: Flash modes
attributes.description: Identifies the different settings for a camera's flash, such as auto or manual

attributes.name: Flash type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of flash used in cameras, such as ring or macro

attributes.name: Focus device type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of focus device used in cameras, e.g. focus assist tool, focus crank

attributes.name: Focus type
attributes.description: Identifies the method of focus in cameras, such as TTL or TTL-CT-SIR

attributes.name: Grain
attributes.description: Indicates the level of graininess in camera film, for example high or fine

attributes.name: Image formats supported
attributes.description: Identifies the image file types a camera can produce, such as JPEG or RAW

attributes.name: Lamp type
attributes.description: Specifies the light source in photographic enlargers, e.g. cold light, dichroic

attributes.name: Lens cap compatible device
attributes.description: Specifies the equipment compatible with lens caps, such as monocular or digital camera

attributes.name: Lens storage type
attributes.description: Describes the type of storage for camera lenses, like lens case or lens pouch

attributes.name: Light exposure modes
attributes.description: Specifies the light adjustment options in cameras, like shutter priority AE or aperture priority AE

attributes.name: Light filtering
attributes.description: Specifies the light filtering capabilities of a product, such as diffusion or blackout

attributes.name: Monitor type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of on-camera monitor, e.g. touchscreen, HDR

attributes.name: Negative/Slide storage type
attributes.description: Specifies the method of storing photographic negatives or slides, e.g. archive storage box, slide carousel

attributes.name: Optical zoom
attributes.description: Indicates the zoom capability of a camera, e.g. no zoom, more than 30x

attributes.name: Photo effects type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of photo effects a camera can produce, e.g. vintage, sepia

attributes.name: Photographic chemical form
attributes.description: Identifies the form of photographic chemicals, such as powder or liquid

attributes.name: Photographic paper size
attributes.description: Specifies the dimensions of photographic paper, such as 4" x 6" or A3

attributes.name: Photographic paper type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of photographic paper used, such as satin or metallic

attributes.name: Projection design
attributes.description: Describes the pattern or image projected by a lighting filter or gobo, such as text or logo

attributes.name: Reel capacity
attributes.description: Specifies the capacity of a reel in a developing tank, such as single or quad

attributes.name: Reflector design
attributes.description: Describes the design of a flash reflector, such as honeycomb or umbrella

attributes.name: Reticle plane
attributes.description: Specifies the reticle focal plane in weapon scopes and sights, e.g., first or second

attributes.name: Reticle type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of reticle in weapon scopes, like Duplex or Mildot

attributes.name: Scene modes
attributes.description: Defines the camera's mode for capturing different scenarios, such as night or underwater

attributes.name: Scope design
attributes.description: Identifies the design type of optics scopes, such as angled or straight

attributes.name: Scope lens type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of lens used in scopes, such as HD or wide-angle

attributes.name: Scope/Sight design
attributes.description: Describes the type of design for weapon scopes or sights, e.g. night vision, laser

attributes.name: Scope/Sight features
attributes.description: Describes special features of weapon scopes or sights, like illuminated reticle or sound recording

attributes.name: Screen/Display design
attributes.description: Specifies the design features of a product's screen, typically for cameras; e.g. viewfinder

attributes.name: Shooting modes
attributes.description: Specifies the camera's operational settings, such as scene or movie mode

attributes.name: Silencer/Blimp type
attributes.description: Specifies the kind of soundproofing device for cameras, such as lens blimp

attributes.name: Softbox mounting type
attributes.description: Specifies the softbox's compatibility with different lighting systems, like Elinchrom or Profoto

attributes.name: Softbox shape
attributes.description: Specifies the geometric shape of softboxes, for instance, rectangle or octagon

attributes.name: Spreader type
attributes.description: Specifies the category of tripod spreader, such as on-ground or mid-level

attributes.name: Suitable for camera type
attributes.description: Identifies the camera models the product is compatible with, such as SLR or camcorder

attributes.name: Suitable for camera/optics device
attributes.description: Identifies the specific camera or optics device the product is compatible with, e.g. digital camera, selfie stick

attributes.name: Suitable for weapon type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of weapon a scope or sight is designed for, e.g. pistol, shotgun

attributes.name: Surveillance camera design
attributes.description: Identifies the design type of security cameras, for example, thermal or panoramic

attributes.name: Surveillance camera mounting type
attributes.description: Identifies how a surveillance camera can be installed, e.g. wall, ceiling

attributes.name: Telescope level
attributes.description: Indicates the complexity or skill level required for a telescope, such as beginner or advanced

attributes.name: Telescope tracking system
attributes.description: Identifies the type of tracking system in telescopes, e.g. manual, motorized

attributes.name: Timer design
attributes.description: Describes the type of timer used in darkroom equipment, such as digital or analog

attributes.name: Trail camera design
attributes.description: Describes the type of trail camera, such as standard or cellular

attributes.name: Tripod handle type
attributes.description: Specifies the functionality of tripod handles, e.g. multi-function, pistol grip

attributes.name: Webcam design
attributes.description: Identifies the type of webcam, such as conference, laptop, or plug-and-play
